meanings.definition: A condition in which eating fava beans or inhaling their pollen causes a hemolytic reaction in individuals with a genetic deficiency of glucose-6-phosphate dehydrogenase.
meanings.sent1: After eating fava beans, his favism caused his red blood cells to break down.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her favism after she had a reaction to fava beans.
meanings.sent3: His favism made him avoid fava beans like they were tiny green grenades.
meanings.sent4: The favism in his body turned fava beans into dangerous triggers for his health.
meanings.sent5: The vivid image of his red blood cells breaking due to favism stayed with him.

meanings.definition: The genetic deficiency of glucose-6-phosphate dehydrogenase that causes a hemolytic reaction to fava beans.
meanings.sent1: The favism in his genes made fava beans a risky choice for him.
meanings.sent2: She learned about her favism when she had a bad reaction to fava beans.
meanings.sent3: His favism gene seemed like a sneaky troublemaker in his family tree.
meanings.sent4: The favism lurking in his DNA turned fava beans into foes.
meanings.sent5: The memory of his favism gene made him cautious around fava beans.
